an4.209:2.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipati hoti …pe… micchaditthiko hoti.
an4.209:3.2: Idha bhikkhave, ekacco attana ca panatipati hoti, paranca panatipate samadapeti …pe… attana ca micchaditthiko hoti, paranca micchaditthiya samadapeti.
an4.209:4.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco panatipata pativirato hoti …pe… sammaditthiko hoti.
an4.209:5.2: Idha, bhikkhave, ekacco attana ca panatipata pativirato hoti, paranca panatipata veramaniya samadapeti …pe… attana ca sammaditthiko hoti, paranca sammaditthiya samadapeti.
